message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it's worth a great deal, so I'm starting the bidding at $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I was hoping for.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? It's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.

I'm still not convinced that $17,000 is a fair price. I've done some research and I think the market value of this product is lower than you're letting on. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $17,000, so I'll offer $14,500. Can you consider that?
